mapper.sql: id, mer_pro_id, cha_ban_id, create_time, update_time, creator, modifier, remark,enabled,sort
mapper.select: select from merchant_channel where mer_pro_id = #{merProId} and enabled = true order by sort

select m.id as merchantId, m.cn_name as merchantName, i.id as institutionId, i.cn_name as institutionName, p.id as productId, pt.name as payType, mp.product_abbrev as productAbbrev, p.currency as productCurrency, p.product_code as productCode, p.trade_direction as tradeDirection, ch.id as channelId, ch.channel_cn_name as channelName, ch.currency as channelCurrency, ch.sort as sort, ch.channel_en_name as channelEnName, b.id as bankID, b.bank_name as bankName, b.bank_country as bankCountry, b.bank_currency as bankCurrency, b.issuer_id as bankIssuerId from merchant m left join institution i on m.institution_id = i.id left join merchant_product mp on m.id = mp.merchant_id left join product p on mp.product_id = p.id left join merchant_channel mc on mc.mer_pro_id = mp.id left join channel_bank cb on cb.id = mc.cha_ban_id left join channel ch on cb.channel_id = ch.id left join bank b on b.id = cb.bank_id left join pay_type pt on pt.extend1 = p.pay_type and pt.language = #{language} where m.id = #{merchantId}

SELECT m.id AS merchantId, m.cn_name as merchantName, i.id as institutionId, i.cn_name as institutionName, p.id AS productId, pt.name as payType, mp.product_abbrev as productAbbrev, p.product_code AS productCode, p.currency AS productCurrency, p.trade_direction as tradeDirection, ch.id AS channelId, ch.channel_cn_name AS channelName, ch.currency as channelCurrency, ch.sort as sort, ch.enabled AS channelEnabled, ch.channel_en_name as channelEnName, b.id as bankID, b.bank_name as bankName, b.bank_country as bankCountry, b.bank_currency as bankCurrency, b.issuer_id as bankIssuerId FROM merchant m left join institution i on m.institution_id = i.id LEFT JOIN merchant_product mp ON m.id = mp.merchant_id LEFT JOIN product p ON p.id = mp.product_id LEFT JOIN product_channel pc ON pc.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN channel ch ON pc.channel_id = ch.id left join channel_bank cb on ch.id = cb.channel_id left join bank b on cb.bank_id = b.id LEFT JOIN pay_type pt ON p.pay_type = pt.extend1 AND pt.`language` = #{language} WHERE m.enabled = 1 AND m.id = #{merchantId}

select mc.id as merChannelId, i.id as institutionId, i.cn_name as institutionName, mp.merchant_id as merchantId,mp.merchant_name as merchantName, mp.product_id as productId,mp.product_abbrev as productAbbrev, ch.id as channelId, ch.channel_cn_name as channelName, ch.currency as channelCurrency,b.bank_name as bankName, mc.create_time,mc.update_time,mc.creator,mc.modifier,mc.enabled, mc.sort from merchant_channel mc left join merchant_product mp on mp.id = mc.mer_pro_id left join merchant m on m.id = mp.merchant_id left join institution i on i.id = m.institution_id left join channel_bank cb on cb.id = mc.cha_ban_id left join channel ch on ch.id = cb.channel_id left join bank b on b.id = cb.bank_id where mc.id=#{merChannelId}
